description: To provide scholarships to incoming UCO students who are enrolled in the upcoming semester: Eligibility Requirements First time UCO Student Must be admitted for the Fall semester Must demonstrate financial need This scholarship is available to apply for during the Incoming Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "Incoming UCO Student Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "Incoming UCO Student Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
